display_name: Overall supine Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=4% desaturation
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4 + marbp4 + manrbp4)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
